actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to ensure the protection of human genetic information collected as a result of diagnostic testing for COVID-19.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
This bill prohibits the use of genetic material collected as a result of a COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) test for any other purpose without the written, informed consent of the individual being tested.

A person who violates this prohibition is subject to a civil monetary penalty of not more than $100 for each violation.

titles.title: A bill to ensure the protection of human genetic information collected as a result of diagnostic testing for COVID-19.
A bill to ensure the protection of human genetic information collected as a result of diagnostic testing for COVID-19.
